SMW Subobject for EmptyHigh Alchemy value: 0Examine: A pole for putting rats on.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Rat poleUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Rat pole.pngWeight: 2.267Value: 1Version anchor: EmptyRelease date: 28 November 2005Item ID: 6773

The rat pole is an item that players obtain during the Ratcatchers quest, which may subsequently be used in the Rat Pits minigame. Players who lose their rat pole can obtain a new empty one by talking to Phingspet and Grimesquit.

Players can attach up to six dead rats to the pole. To attach a rat, the player must first be wielding the pole, and not just have it in their inventory. The player must use their cat to catch rats. When the cat catches a rat, the player has the option to put the rat on the pole. An adult cat or wily cat is recommended for this, as they have a much better success rate than kittens. The rat pole is not recommended as a weapon, being more or less for bragging rights.

[[File:Rat pole detail.png|left|130px]]
The '''rat pole''' is an [[item]] that players obtain during the [[Ratcatchers]] [[quest]], which may subsequently be used in the [[Rat Pits]] [[Minigames|minigame]]. Players who lose their rat pole can obtain a new empty one by talking to [[Phingspet]] and [[Grimesquit]].

Players can attach up to six dead [[rat]]s to the pole. To attach a rat, the player must first be wielding the pole, and not just have it in their [[inventory]]. The player must use their [[cat]] to catch rats. When the cat catches a rat, the player has the option to put the rat on the pole. An adult cat or wily cat is recommended for this, as they have a much better success rate than [[kitten]]s. The rat pole is not recommended as a weapon, being more or less for bragging rights.
